mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (btitle, bcontent, bwriter, bimage, breply) VALUES (#{btitle}, #{bcontent}, #{bwriter},#{bimage},#{breply})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board WHERE breply IS NULL ORDER BY bno DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET btitle = #{btitle}, bcontent = #{bcontent}, bwriter = #{bwriter}, bimage = #{bimage} WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM board WHERE breply = #{breply} ORDER BY bno DESC
